thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 17 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India's Mindtree Dec Qtr Consol Profit Up 37 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's Mindtree Dec Qtr Consol Profit Up 37 Pct
text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - Mindtree Ltd:
* DEC QUARTER CONSOL NET PROFIT 1.42 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT OF 1.03 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* CONSENSUS FORECAST FOR DEC QUARTER CONSOL NET PROFIT WAS 1.11 BILLION RUPEES
* DEC QUARTER CONSOL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 13.78 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 12.95 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* SAYS DECLARED INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 2 RUPEES PER SHARE * SAYS 344 ACTIVE CLIENTS AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017 * SAYS TRAILING 12 MONTHS ATTRITION IS 12.6 PERCENT AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017 Source text - bit.ly/2DnHVrn Further company coverage:
